focusedAbilities.desc: At the start of the Action Phase of your turn, increase one of your numbers by 3, a different one of your numbers by 2, and one of your remaining numbers by 1. This can only increase a number to a maximum value of 9.
focusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of the action phase of your turn

fusedAbilities.desc: At the start of the Action Phase of your turn, increase one of your numbers by 2, and one of your other numbers by 1. This can only increase a number to a maximum value of 5.
fusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of the action phase of your turn

franticAbilities.desc: At the start of the Action Phase of this turn, increase one of your numbers by 3, a different one of your numbers by 2, and one of your remaining numbers by 1. This can only increase a number to a maximum value of 9.
franticAbilities.trigger: at the start of the action phase of this turn

actions.name: War Dance
actions.desc:
Move 1, then deal 1 damage to an enemy within range.
5+: Move 2, then deal 2 damage to an enemy within range.
9+: Move 3, then deal 2 damage to an enemy within range.

alphaSuper.name: Become My Canvas
alphaSuper.desc: Deal 2 damage to an enemy within range, ignoring Armor and Shields. Then, deal 2 damage to an enemy within range, ignoring Armor and Shields. Then, deal 3 damage to an enemy within range, ignoring Armor and Shields

deltaSuper.name: Lightning Drop
deltaSuper.desc: Teleport to any space on the map. Then, deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy. Then, deal 2 damage to all enemies within Range 1-4.
